label: GuestArrival
comment: The act of coming to or reaching a place by a specified guest.

datatypeProperties.comment: The identifier of the carrier for this specified guest arrival.
A carrier's name, expressed as text, related to this specified guest arrival.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value when this specified guest arrival is expected.
The code specifying the mode, such as by air, sea, rail, road or inland waterway, for this logistics transport movement.

referencedBy.comment: An arrival notified for this guest person.
